name: PostIt
description: This is a content sharing website where you can share your post with others

scripts.start: export db=postitDB.db; rm -f database/postitDB.db; ./shell_scripts/setDb.sh database/postitDB.db; node server.js
scripts.test: export db=testDB.db; ./shell_scripts/setDb.sh database/testDB.db; nyc mocha; rm -f database/testDB.db
